publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6393.1 Murdo Fraser: Progress Towards 18 Week Referral to Treatmentâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6393) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, insert at end ", and urges the Scottish Government to ensure that such progress is not compromised by either reductions in its budget or by efficiency savings within NHS boards."
